entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 9:15 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Temperature: -29.7°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
